sentences.sentence: Plasmodium falciparum and Plasmodium vivax are the most common.
sentences.translation: 恶性疟和间日疟最常见。

sentences.sentence: The sporogony duration of Plasmodium vivax in An. sinensis were observed.
The aim is to investigate the effect of IL6 on the development of exoerythrocytic forms of Plasmodium yoelii.
sentences.translation: 目的是观察 IL-6 对大鼠体内约氏疟原虫红外期发育的影响。
